person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Member of Parliament Tony Marlow said the resignation of the chancellor of the exchequer was the only way to make the Conservatives electable in a general election which must take place by May next year .

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
|--------|
| Member of Parliament Tony Marlow |
| Chancellor of the Exchequer |

Note: In the context of the paragraph, the identity of the current Chancellor of the Exchequer is not mentioned, so it is not possible to identify a specific person for that role. The statement is about the need for the current Chancellor to resign in order to make the Conservatives electable, but it does not specify who the current Chancellor is.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
|--------|
| Member of Parliament Tony Marlow |

Note: In the context of the paragraph, there is no other entity mentioned that clearly refers to a person. The paragraph only mentions "the resignation of the chancellor" but it does not specify who the chancellor is, so it is not possible to identify a specific person for that role. Therefore, only "Member of Parliament Tony Marlow" is a valid entity in this context.
